thread.section_title: citizenM New York Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location
thread.title_full: Fantastic location - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Spencemarc
title: Fantastic location
text: Our third visit to a CitizenM hotel. Fantastic location at the heart of New York. Check in as usual was very quick and efficient. The room was exactly the same as the others we have visited. The only criticism I would have with the room is there are no tea/coffee making facilities. The selection of free films and tv available was very good. Like the others we have visited, everything in the room is managed via an iPad! The bar is really nice but quite expensive for drinks. Two black coffees in take away cups was $12 versus $6 in the small take away cafe a few doors away. All of the staff we spoke to for directions etc were excellent. Good value for such a central location in NYC. I would happily use a citizenM hotel in the future.
